title: MamunMKY
author: MamunMKY
created_time: April 11, 2023, 05:00:04 AMLast edit: April 11, 2023, 01:18:31 PM by MamunMKY
content: Website Twitter Telegram Bounty group 1. Bounty campaign will be managed by Crypto Networks Community 2. 3000$ USDT are allocated for this Bounty. 3. The bounty program was launched on 11.04.2023 and will run until 08.05.2023Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.Crypto Networks team can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.General Rulesüó£Ô∏èAll Participants Must join JOKER METAVERSE Social Media And (Bounty Group) ¬†‚òÖOnce rejected he will not be accepted again Participants cannot change their wallet address after registration, Must be double check your wallet address before registration for any campaignüó£Ô∏èTalking About The Bounty in The Project Chat Group Will Lead To Immediate Disqualification From The Campaign And An Instant Ban From The Company Chat Groupüó£Ô∏èPlease Ask Your Bounty related Questions in the Crypto Networks Groupüó£Ô∏èPlease Note That Any Offensive or inappropriate Behavour Will Lead To Immediate Disqualification From The Campaign *Using Multiple Accounts, Cheating And Spanning Are Not Allowedüó£Ô∏èKYC not necessary for this campaign All Participants Must Send The Proof of Authentication Post To Join The Bounty Program ¬†And give a positive feedback in the comment.Important rule : You must be a ¬†Newbie with 50 minimum activityTwitter 35%Telegram 25%Article 20%Video 20%Week 1: 11/04-18/04Week 2: 19/04-26/04Wwek 3: 27/04-03/05Week 4: 04/05-11/05Submit your weekly report on bounty thread.Twitter Campaign 200 Members Telegram Campaign 100 MembersArticle Campaign 40 Members Video Campaign 60 MembersIf you have any problem regarding missing stakes, please fill the form below Complaint Form Complaint Spreadsheet Note: Complaints will be checked once in every week.Rewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules: ¬†1. Every participant must follow JOKER METAVERSE Twitter Page,2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweets/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #getdividendtillinfinty#realtimegame #firsttimeever#nftindia #cards #poker #rummy #bluff hashtags in every retweet or tweet.JOIN NOW Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | JOKER METAVERSE.(Example: Crypto Networks | JOKER METAVERSE)2. Replace your profile picture with JOKER METAVERSE.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more thanone project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You mustinteract with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign.Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange‚Äôs telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin,Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups won‚Äôt be counted.6. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.7. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.8. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.9. You must wear JOKER METAVERSE avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†avatar ¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† Download  ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†JOIN NOW Rewards:High quality: 3 stakesGood quality: 2 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules: ¬†1. Each participant can write 1 article only.2. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards).Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.3. High engagements but poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awardedbased on quality and the number of engagements with other criteria.4. Quality articles with less or no engagements will be rewarded accordingly.5. Participants' forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.6. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.7. Content must focus on a relevant topic: Project features, Staking / Liquidity rewards, Presale,Latest project's token updates, Blockchain, etc.8. Only quality and original content will be accepted. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.10. Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!11. By joining this program, participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials.JOIN NOW Rewards:Average quality -1 StakeGood quality - 3 StakeHigh quality - 5 StakeRules:1. Video need to be min of 2 minutes & must have at least 100 subscribers video contents must focus on project features, token sale, blockchain, Bsc.2. Video must be English others local Language is not accepted3. Videos need to have a link to the btt username poa post & project website.4. Each participant can sand 2 video only ( Youtube & Tiktok)JOIN NOW
